meanings.definition: Overcome in a contest or conflict
meanings.sent1: The team defeats their rivals in the final match.
meanings.sent2: She defeats her fear of heights by climbing the mountain.
meanings.sent3: The superhero defeats the villain with a clever plan.
meanings.sent5: The sun defeats the darkness with its bright light.

meanings.definition: Cause (someone) to fail or be overcome
meanings.sent1: His overconfidence defeats him in the competition.
meanings.sent2: Lack of preparation defeats success in many cases.
meanings.sent3: The slippery floor defeats his attempt to walk gracefully.

meanings.definition: The action of defeating an opponent in a game or battle
meanings.sent1: The defeat of the enemy army was a turning point in the war.
meanings.sent2: The soccer team celebrated their latest defeat of the rival team.
meanings.sent3: The defeat in chess taught him a valuable lesson about strategy.
meanings.sent4: The defeat in the game was a bitter pill to swallow.
meanings.sent5: The defeat in the tournament motivated them to train harder.
